Description: Three beads in different shape and material A: One barrel-shaped bead made of a black stone with white speckles. B: One extended spherical bead made of white faience. C: One disc-shaped bead made of white faience.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2 i, floor 3-4
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
